title: Precious Lord Take My Hand

author.name: Thomas A. Dorsey
author.bio: Thomas A. Dorsey was an American musician, composer, and pioneer of gospel music. Often referred to as the 'Father of Gospel Music,' he composed many songs that have become gospel standards. 'Precious Lord Take My Hand' is one of his most famous and enduring works, written in a time of personal grief.

lyrics:
1 Precious Lord, take my hand
Lead me on, help me stand
I am tired, I am weak,
I am worn
Through the storm
Through the night
Lead me on to the light
Take my hand, precious Lord,
Lead me home

2 When my way grows drear,
Precious Lord, linger near,
When my life is almost gone
Hear my cry, hear my call,
Hold my hand, lest I fall
Take my hand, precious Lord,
Lead me Home
